mapper.insert: insert into plans(plan_id, plan_name, frequency, real_price, vr_price, vendor_id) VALUES (#{plan_id}, #{plan_name}, #{frequency}, #{real_price}, #{vr_price}, #{vendor_id})
mapper.select: select * from plans where plan_id = #{plan_id} and id != #{id}
SELECT count(p.id) from plans p LEFT JOIN sub_manage s on p.id = s.plan_id where (s.user_id != #{user_id} or s.user_id is null) and p.real_price > 0.00
